text:
Moussa Faki Mahamat (', born 21 June 1960) is a Chadian politician and diplomat. He has been Chairperson of the African Union Commission since 14 March 2017. He was Prime Minister of Chad from 24 June 2003 to 4 February 2005 and Minister of Foreign Affairs from April 2008 to January 2017.
On 30 January 2017, he was elected as Chairperson of the African Union Commission.

annotations.surface_form: Chairperson of the African Union Commission
